name: mutate
signature: { (f: (date: Date) => void, options?: { readonly disambiguation?: Disambiguation; }): <A extends DateTime>(self: A) => A; <A extends DateTime>(self: A, f: (date: Date) => void, options?: { readonly disambiguation?: Disambiguation; }): A; }
description:
Modify a `DateTime` by applying a function to a cloned `Date` instance. The `Date` will first have the time zone applied if possible, and then be
converted back to a `DateTime` within the same time zone. Supports `disambiguation` when the new wall clock time is ambiguous.
documentation:
Modify a `DateTime` by applying a function to a cloned `Date` instance.

The `Date` will first have the time zone applied if possible, and then be
converted back to a `DateTime` within the same time zone.

Supports `disambiguation` when the new wall clock time is ambiguous.
